enhanced_by.reason: The isbn10 method relies on the isbnGroup method to generate the group identifier, which is a critical part of the ISBN-10 structure.
The isbn10 method relies on the isbnRegistrant method to generate the registrant element, which is another critical part of the ISBN-10 structure.
Both isbn10 and isbn13 methods generate ISBN numbers, and their outputs can be compared to ensure consistency in ISBN generation logic.
The isbn10CheckDigit method calculates the check digit for an ISBN-10, which is a critical part of the isbn10 method's functionality. Assertions can be made based on the check digit calculation.
